__e: Said she had this bonkers idea that I was working for vampires, and didn't like it.
I don't have nothing against vampires, you know that.
The vampires and the human faction have an arrangement, just like we have with you all.
I think in a lot of ways, the vamps are really no different than you or I.
And they can do things vampires cannot.
Because a vampire's life isn't natural, neither is our death.
You just couldn't see the light, but you see it now, don't you, now that your body was stolen by the very same family of vampires that are trying to steal mine!
I have had it to here with vampires telling me what to do!
If vampire politics are more important to him than me...
This is town is our home, And the vampires are my family.
Don't leave home without 'em. So, you know what he is and you're okay with that?
The vampires said, "Only we know how to protect our own."
I told her vampers killed her parents.
- Vampires assassinated my father because of his campaign against the vampire agenda.
- It's vampires that did this to us. - These are different vampires.
Well, am I the only one who's noticed that everybody's got vampires but us?
He's not answering his phone and he's not here, which, you know, big deal, we've only got a killer vampire hunter on the loose.
